Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/min

Function &T <: num min(&T <: num n, &T <: num m)
Description The smallest of two numbers. The type of the result is the same as the type of the smallest argument.
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>min(12, 13);
int: 12
rascal>min(12, -13);
int: -13
rascal>min(3.14, 4);
num: 3.14
Questions

Question 2.

Question 3.
The type of min(-7.86555740276894800, 17.95153765808007200) is

Question 4. 
min(9, -4) ==
